pageContext.claim: “The market is hitting almost new highs, and I have all of the records -- every single record, I have. Every single record for the stock market.”
pageContext.analysis: The capitalization of the top U.S. companies -- as measured by the Dow Jones, S&P 500 and Nasdaq composite index -- has reached record highs under Trump. But he doesn't hold all the records. These indicators grew at a faster rate in the 1990s.
